TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousPipeClientStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousPipeClientStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class AnonymousPipeClientStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes the client side of an anonymous pipe stream, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes the client side of an anonymous pipe stream, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匿名管道有助於提供安全子項與父代之間的處理序間通訊的處理程序。Anonymous pipes help provide safe and secure interprocess communication between child and parent processes. 類別可讓您連接到並父處理序與交換資訊的子處理序。The class enables a child process to connect to and exchange information with a parent process. 匿名管道是未命名，但單向通常父和子處理序之間傳輸資料的管道。Anonymous pipes are unnamed, one-way pipes that typically transfer data between parent and child processes. 匿名管道永遠是本機。無法用在網路上。Anonymous pipes are always local; they cannot be used over a network. A值匿名管道定義為單向，所以不支援。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 不支援匿名管道讀取模式。Anonymous pipes do not support read modes. 匿名管道的用戶端必須從所呼叫的伺服器端提供的管道控制代碼建立方法。The client side of an anonymous pipe must be created from a pipe handle provided by the server side by calling the method. 然後，做為參數來傳遞的字串，建立用戶端處理序時。The string is then passed as a parameter when creating the client process. 從用戶端處理序，它會傳遞至建構函式做為`pipeHandleAsString`參數。From the client process, it is passed to the constructor as the `pipeHandleAsString` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道同時可以透過網路連線。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用匿名管道從父處理序傳送字串至子處理序。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 此範例會在父處理序中，使用 的 值建立 物件。This example creates an object in a parent process with a value of . 它也會建立子處理序中的物件值。It also creates an object in a child process with a value of . 接著，父處理序會將使用者提供的字串傳送給子處理序。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 字串會顯示到主控台。The string is displayed to the console. 這個範例是由伺服器處理序已啟動用戶端處理程序。This example is for the client process, which is started by the server process. 用戶端程式碼產生可執行檔的名稱`pipeClient.exe`並將它複製到相同的目錄伺服器可執行檔，當您執行此範例。Name the resulting executable from the client code `pipeClient.exe` and copy it to the same directory as the server executable when you run this example. 整個程式碼範例中，將程式碼管道用戶端和伺服器，請參閱[How to： 使用匿名管道進行本機處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Anonymous Pipes for Local Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream_Sample/vb/program.vb#01)]
